labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Hong Kong', 'Netherlands', 'Switzerland', 'Basic Materials', 'Cyclical Consumer Goods & Services'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Hong Kong', 'Netherlands', 'Switzerland']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Hong Kong', 'Japan', 'Netherlands', 'ETFs', 'Financials'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Hong Kong']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Ireland', 'Switzerland', 'United States of America', 'Cyclical Consumer Goods & Services', 'Non-Cyclical Consumer Goods & Services'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Switzerland', 'United States of America']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': [] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Hong Kong', 'Switzerland', 'Healthcare']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australia', 'Canada', 'Netherlands', 'Energy', 'Financials'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Australia', 'Canada', 'Netherlands']
